messages.message:
<!channel> :star: :star: :star: :star:

Hi all........I apologize. There was another piece to the `docker pull` problems that I forgot to add to the template:

```
cs/mfichman❯ cat ~/.aws/config
[profile default]
region = us-east-2
credential_process = idfed aws 519787998606 crafting-sandbox-role```
Your AWS config should have this snippet.

• If the file doesn't exist, please resync your sandbox again.
• I*f your ~/.aws/config already exists, you need to edit it manually.* 
Crafting has an option to force-overwrite this file, but I don't want to to turn that on, b/c many people have custom AWS profiles set up here.
now i'm getting this error in the `bazel-remote` daemon, and none of the other daemons are even starting
BTW, that bazel-remote daemon got removed recently

I did a cs restart and that seemed to help:
```^_^ 10:41:36|owner:~/instabase (master)$ cs restart
✔ serena-w2/dev

Though the bazel-remote is still there -- you may need to pull/rebase master, but you can ignore it for now
Weirdly in your sandbox, every time I do `cs ps` it prompts for which sandbox to look at. Probably some custom config in your sandbox...?

```O_O 10:44:06|owner:~/instabase (master)$ ^C
O_O 10:44:06|owner:~/instabase (master)$ cs ps
Use the arrow keys to navigate: ↓ ↑ → ← 
? Sandbox and workspace: 
  ▸ serena-w2/dev
    serena-w/dev
    pr-69634-cypress/dev
    pr-72729-cypress/dev
↓   pr-72535-cypress/dev```

i have no idea, i'm frustrated by that too

it's probably bc workspace:dev was stuck at `[Step 14] Build:instabase` forever? i just created this sandbox yesterday
Weird -- let's try resetting the base image to see if we can fix that
i'll do that later after the services all finish building :pray:

~/.aws/config
[profile default]
region = us-east-2
credential_process = idfed aws 519787998606 crafting-sandbox-role

still has the error

i added and the placeholder turn into access key and secret access key
